title: Rene Spitz: about his own work
creator_credit: Parents' Magazine Films and Susan Sussman
brief_description: A professional portrait of Dr. Rene Spitz, paediatrician and psychiatrist, largely based on footage taken on a visit to the Erikson Institute in Chicago, 1969. Dr. Spitz is best known for his work on the effects of emotional deprivation on children.
